welcome_message_body: Welcome to Versailles, the charming city known for its breathtaking chateau and beautiful gardens. We hope you enjoy exploring all the history and beauty this city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and chartered flights at Toussus-le-noble Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Le Bourget Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Comprised of 7 sub-terminals, Terminal 2 is the busiest and most modern terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be slow during peak hours.
